org.kiji.schema.layout
Class KijiColumnNameTranslator

java.lang.Object
  org.kiji.schema.layout.KijiColumnNameTranslator
Direct Known Subclasses:
HBaseNativeColumnNameTranslator, IdentityColumnNameTranslator, ShortColumnNameTranslator
@ApiAudience.Framework
@ApiStability.Experimental
public abstract class KijiColumnNameTranslator
extends Object

Translates between HTable and Kiji table column names.

This abstract class defines an interface for mapping between names of HBase HTable families/qualifiers and Kiji table family/qualifiers.

KijiColumnNameTranslator

public KijiColumnNameTranslator()
Method Detail

from

public static KijiColumnNameTranslator from(KijiTableLayout tableLayout)
Creates a new KijiColumnNameTranslator instance. Supports either ShortColumnNameTranslator, IdentityColumnNameTranslator, HBaseNativeColumnNameTranslator based on the table layout.

Parameters:
tableLayout - The layout of the table to translate column names for.
Returns:
KijiColumnNameTranslator of the appropriate type specified by the layout

toKijiColumnName

public abstract KijiColumnName toKijiColumnName(HBaseColumnName hbaseColumnName)
                                         throws NoSuchColumnException
Translates an HBase column name to a Kiji column name.

Parameters:
hbaseColumnName - The HBase column name.
Returns:
The Kiji column name.
Throws:
NoSuchColumnException - If the column name cannot be found.

toHBaseFamilyName

public abstract byte[] toHBaseFamilyName(KijiTableLayout.LocalityGroupLayout localityGroup)
Translates a Kiji LocalityGroup into an HBase family name.

Parameters:
localityGroup - The Kiji locality group.
Returns:
The HBase column name.
